title: Bug Tracker App
description: Bug tracking system with customizable options, detailed info, and easy search/filter capabilities.

title: Game Hub
description: The Game Hub project is a team effort to create a bunch of short games using free APIs.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: The weather Dashboard using The Open Weather Map.

title: Readme Generator
description: Command-line application built in Node.js to simplify the creation of professional README files for GitHub projects.

title: Books Finder API
description: Uses Google Books API, leverages 'async/await' for efficiency, and offers a user-friendly interface to search, view, and save books.

title: SMS Integration
description: The implementation of SMS integration with the MERN stack using Twilio.
